paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a TTR variant associated with hereditary amyloidosis, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: two brothers from a large kindred in the Appalachian region of the United States

individual_records.phenotype_details: presented with symptoms of familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Biochemical studies were conducted on amyloid from one patient and plasma prealbumin from his affected brother.

individual_records.phenotype_details: presented with symptoms of familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Biochemical studies were conducted on amyloid from one patient and plasma prealbumin from his affected brother.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in a substitution of alanine for threonine at position 60, affecting the protein structure.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed through biochemical studies and RFLP analysis.
key_quotes: In all cases studied these fibrils have been found to be composed of plasma prealbumin (transthyretin) containing a single amino acid substitution.
Studies of the plasma prealbumin showed that the same substitution was present in 40-45% of the protein.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
